TEXT.TITLE: CBT METALS/FINANCIALS DELIVERY LOCATIONS
TEXT.BODY: The following deliveries are scheduled for April 6 against Chicago Baord of Trade Futures - Silver - 392 lots at Chicago, Illinois. Kilo Gold - 21 lots. 16 at Chicago, Illinois, 5 at New York, New York. Reuter
